nodes.text: Nihema was an Imperial Navy Assassin-class corvette that fought in the conflict at Mylok IV. When the Habeen team sent two cargo ferry groups, Verack and Stimner, to rendezvous with, then Admiral Zaarin aboard the Nebulon-B2 frigate Shamus, they deployed three flight groups of TIE/LN starfighters, Alpha, Beta, and Gamma. Should the need of back-up arise, Nihema, along with Assault Gunboats and a small number of TIE/sa bombers, were set to arrive to assist the Imperial starfighters.
